attributes.action: get more police parole and safety schemes on London streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A GROUP OF ME AND A FEW STUDENTS AT MY SCHOOL HAVE RAISED AWERENESS OF HOW YOUNG PEOPLE'S SAFETY IS NOT REALLY CONSIDERED BY LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN LONDON. WE WANT MORE SAFETY SCHEMES AND POLICE PAROLES TO ENSURE THE SAFETY OF YOUNG PEOPLE IN LONDON.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
